tensordb.tensor_definition.DAGOrder¶

pydantic model tensordb.tensor_definition.DAGOrder¶

As the tensor has relations between them, it is possible to create a DAG that facilities the process of updating every one of them, so the idea is that this class keep the necessary information for sorting the tensor execution.

Show JSON schema

Fields

  • depends (Optional[List[str]])

  • group (Optional[str])

  • omit_on (List[Literal['append', 'update', 'store', 'upsert']])

field depends: Optional[List[str]] [Required]¶

Every element of the list is a tensor on which this tensor depends, so this can be seen like every tensor Ai of the list has an edge to this tensor B, so Ai->B for every i.

field group: Optional[str] = 'regular'¶

Useful to send parameters by groups on the exec_on_dag_order method of the tensor client

field omit_on: List[Literal['append', 'update', 'store', 'upsert']] = []¶

Indicate if the tensor must be omitted on the methods inside the list, useful for generating reference nodes or avoid calling methods on tensors that are simply formulas but other tensors use them.

tensordb.tensor_definition.StorageDefinition
